name: avalanche-json-rpc-specification
description: Package containing tools to produce generated artifacts for the Avalanche OpenRPC document. Please see the git repository for more information

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run generate-clients && npm run build:docs
scripts.publish: npm run publish:typescript && npm run publish:rust
scripts.build:docs: cd build/docs/gatsby && npm install && npm run build
scripts.publish:typescript: cd build/client/typescript && npm install && npm run build && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish:rust: cd build/client/rust && cargo build && cargo package && cargo publish --token $CARGO_TOKEN

author: Lucas espinosa
